Translations.Text: ha-mim
velkitabi-lmubin
inna ce`alnahu kur'anen `arabiyyel le`allekum ta`kilun
veinnehu fi ummi-lkitabi ledeyna le`aliyyun hakim
efenadribu `ankumu-zzikra safhan en kuntum kavmem musrifin
vekem erselna min nebiyyin fi-l'evvelin
vema ye'tihim min nebiyyin illa kanu bihi yestehziun
feehlekna esedde minhum batsev vemeda meselu-l'evvelin
velein seeltehum men haleka-ssemavati vel'arda leyekulunne halekahunne-l`azizu-l`alim
ellezi ce`ale lekumu-l'arda mehdev vece`ale lekum fiha subulel le`allekum tehtedun
vellezi nezzele mine-ssemai maem bikader. feenserna bihi beldetem meyta. kezalike tuhracun
vellezi haleka-l'ezvace kulleha vece`ale lekum mine-lfulki vel'en`ami ma terkebun
litestevu `ala zuhurihi summe tezkuru ni`mete rabbikum ize-steveytum `aleyhi vetekulu subhane-llezi sehhara lena haza vema kunna lehu mukrinin
veinna ila rabbina lemunkalibun
vece`alu lehu min `ibadihi cuz'a. inne-l'insane lekefurum mubin
emi-ttehaze mimma yahluku benativ veasfakum bilbenin
veiza bussira ehaduhum bima darabe lirrahmani meselen zalle vechuhu musveddev vehuve kezim
evemey yunesseu fi-lhilyeti vehuve fi-lhisami gayru mubin
vece`alu-lmelaikete-llezine hum `ibadu-rrahmani inasa. esehidu halkahum. setuktebu sehadetuhum veyus'elun
vekalu lev sae-rrahmanu ma `abednahum. ma lehum bizalike min `ilm. in hum illa yahrusun
em ateynahum kitabem min kablihi fehum bihi mustemsikun
bel kalu inna vecedna abaena `ala ummetiv veinna `ala asarihim muhtedun
vekezalike ma erselna min kablike fi karyetim min nezirin illa kale mutrafuha inna vecedna abaena `ala ummetiv veinna `ala asarihim muktedun
kale evelev ci'tukum biehda mimma vecettum `aleyhi abaekum. kalu inna bima ursiltum bihi kafirun
fentekamna minhum fenzur keyfe kane `akibetu-lmukezzibin
veiz kale ibrahimu liebihi vekavmihi inneni beraum mimma ta`budun
ille-llezi fetarani feinnehu seyehdin
vece`aleha kelimetem bakiyeten fi `akibihi le`allehum yerci`un
bel metta`tu haulai veabaehum hatta caehumu-lhakku verasulum mubin
velemma caehumu-lhakku kalu haza sihruv veinna bihi kafirun
vekalu levla nuzzile haze-lkur'anu `ala raculim mine-lkaryeteyni `azim

ehum yaksimune rahmete rabbik. nahnu kasemna beynehum me`isetehum fi-lhayati-ddunya verafa`na ba`dahum fevka ba`din deracatil liyettehize ba`duhum ba`dan suhriyya. verahmetu rabbike hayrum mimma yecme`un
velevla ey yekune-nnasu ummetev vahidetel lece`alna limey yekfuru birrahmani libuyutihim sukufem min fiddativ veme`arice `aleyha yazherun
velibuyutihim ebvabev vesururan `aleyha yettekiun
vezuhrufa. vein kullu zalike lemma meta`u-lhayati-ddunya. vel'ahiratu `inde rabbike lilmuttekin
vemey ya`su `an zikri-rrahmani nukayyid lehu seytanen fehuve lehu karin
veinnehum leyesuddunehum `ani-ssebili veyahsebune ennehum muhtedun
hatta iza caena kale ya leyte beyni vebeyneke bu`de-lmesrikayni febi'se-lkarin
veley yenfe`akumu-lyevme iz zalemtum ennekum fi-l`azabi musterikun
efeente tusmi`u-ssumme ev tehdi-l`umye vemen kane fi dalalim mubin
feimma nezhebenne bike feinna minhum muntekimun
ev nuriyenneke-llezi ve`adnahum feinna `aleyhim muktedirun
festemsik billezi uhiye ileyk. inneke `ala siratim mustekim
veinnehu lezikrul leke velikavmik. vesevfe tus'elun
ves'el men erselna min kablike mir rusulina. ece`alna min duni-rrahmani alihetey yu`bedun
velekad erselna musa biayatina ila fir`avne vemeleihi fekale inni rasulu rabbi-l`alemin
felemma caehum biayatina iza hum minha yadhakun
vema nurihim min ayetin illa hiye ekberu min uhtiha. veehaznahum bil`azabi le`allehum yerci`un
vekalu ya eyyuhe-ssahiru-d`u lena rabbeke bima `ahide `indeke innena lemuhtedun
felemma kesefna `anhumu-l`azabe iza hum yenkusun
venada fir`avnu fi kavmihi kale ya kavmi eleyse li mulku misra vehazihi-l'enharu tecri min tahti. efela tubsirun
em ene hayrum min haze-llezi huve mehinuv vela yekadu yubin
felevla ulkiye `aleyhi esviratum min zehebin ev cae me`ahu-lmelaiketu mukterinin
festehaffe kavmehu feeta`uh. innehum kanu kavmen fasikin
felemma asefune-ntekamna minhum feagraknahum ecme`in
fece`alnahum selefev vemeselel lil'ahirin
velemma duribe-bnu meryeme meselen iza kavmuke minhu yesiddun
vekalu ealihetuna hayrun em hu. ma darabuhu leke illa cedela. bel hum kavmun hasimun
in huve illa `abdun en`amna `aleyhi vece`alnahu meselel libeni israil
velev nesau lece`alna minkum melaiketen fi-l'ardi yahlufun
veinnehu le`ilmul lissa`ati fela temterunne biha vettebi`un. haza siratum mustekim
vela yesuddennekumu-sseytan. innehu lekum `aduvvum mubin
velemma cae `isa bilbeyyinati kale kad ci'tukum bilhikmeti veliubeyyine lekum ba`da-llezi tahtelifune fih. fetteku-llahe veeti`un
inne-llahe huve rabbi verabbukum fa`buduh. haza siratum mustekim
fahtelefe-l'ahzabu mim beynihim. feveylul lillezine zalemu min `azabi yevmin elim
hel yenzurune ille-ssa`ate en te'tiyehum bagtetev vehum la yes`urun
el'ehillau yevmeizim ba`duhum liba`din `aduvvun ille-lmuttekin
ya `ibadi la havfun `aleykumu-lyevme vela entum tahzenun
ellezine amenu biayatina vekanu muslimin
udhulu-lcennete entum veezvacukum tuhberun
yutafu `aleyhim bisihafim min zehebiv veekvab. vefiha ma testehihi-l'enfusu vetelezzu-l'a`yun. veentum fiha halidun
vetilke-lcennetu-lleti uristumuha bima kuntum ta`melun
lekum fiha fakihetun kesiratum minha te'kulun
inne-lmucrimine fi `azabi cehenneme halidun
la yufetteru `anhum vehum fihi mublisun
vema zalemnahum velakin kanu humu-zzalimin
venadev ya maliku liyakdi `aleyna rabbuk. kale innekum makisun
lekad ci'nakum bilhakki velakinne ekserakum lilhakki karihun
em ebramu emran feinna mubrimun
em yahsebune enna la nesme`u sirrahum venecvahum. bela verusuluna ledeyhim yektubun
kul in kane lirrahmani veled. feena evvelu-l`abidin
subhane rabbi-ssemavati vel'ardi rabbi-l`arsi `amma yesifun
fezerhum yehudu veyel`abu hatta yulaku yevmehumu-llezi yu`adun
vehuve-llezi fi-ssemai ilahuv vefi-l'ardi ilahun. vehuve-lhakimu-l`alim
vetebarake-llezi lehu mulku-ssemavati vel'ardi vema beynehuma. ve`indehu `ilmu-ssa`ah. veileyhi turce`un
vela yemliku-llezine yed`une min dunihi-ssefa`ate illa men sehide bilhakki vehum ya`lemun
velein seeltehum men halekahum leyekulunne-llahu feenna yu'fekun
vekilihi ya rabbi inne haulai kavmul la yu'minun
fasfah `anhum vekul selam. fesevfe ya`lemun
